text: Harry Bates may refer to: *Harry Bates (sculptor) (1850–1899), English sculptor *Harry Bates (footballer) (1890–?), English footballer *Harry Bates (author) (1900–1981), science fiction editor and writer *Harry Bates (priest) (1912–1980), Archdeacon of Lindisfarne *Harry Bates (Coronation Street), fictional character on British television ==See also== *Harry Bates Thayer (1858–1936), American electrical and telephone businessman *Henry Bates (disambiguation) *Harold Raymond Kingsmill Bates (1916–2006), officer in the British Royal Navy
title: Harry Bates
